title: Adele Givens
description:
Adele Givens joins Kevin Hart to talk about the impact of the Queens of Comedy tour, how Def Comedy Jam created a space for black comics, and what it was like to work with other comedy legends like Sommore, Russell Simmons, and Martin Lawrence.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Adele Givens, Kevin Hart)
